${ModID}:AgileStrike.NAME: Agile Strike
${ModID}:AgileStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have equipped a ${ModID}:Weapon this turn, reduce cost of this NL card to 0.

${ModID}:CatONineTails.NAME: Cat O' Nine Tails
${ModID}:CatONineTails.DESCRIPTION: Equip a !M! / 3 ${ModID}:Weapon. NL After you attack with this ${ModID}:Weapon, give it +2 Attack.

${ModID}:DeadlyArsenal.NAME: Deadly Arsenal
${ModID}:DeadlyArsenal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card for each unique ${ModID}:Weapon you have currently equipped.

${ModID}:PowderKeg.NAME: Powder Keg
${ModID}:PowderKeg.DESCRIPTION: Equip a 0 / 1 ${ModID}:Weapon. NL When it is destroyed, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ForgingHammer.NAME: Forging Hammer
${ModID}:ForgingHammer.DESCRIPTION: Equip a 3 / !M! ${ModID}:Weapon. NL After you attack with this ${ModID}:Weapon, Upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Sword.NAME: Sword
${ModID}:Sword.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Swords. NL Equip a 3 / !M! ${ModID}:Weapon with an additional effect.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: #rFire: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies. NL #yWisdom: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, draw a card. NL #pChaos: Whenever you attack with this Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

${ModID}:SwordOfFire.NAME: Sword of Fire
${ModID}:SwordOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Equip a 3 / !M! ${ModID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${ModID}:Weapon, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SwordOfWisdom.NAME: Sword of Wisdom
${ModID}:SwordOfWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Equip a 3 / !M! ${ModID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${ModID}:Weapon, draw a card.

${ModID}:SwordOfChaos.NAME: Sword of Chaos
${ModID}:SwordOfChaos.DESCRIPTION: Equip a 3 / !M! ${ModID}:Weapon. NL Whenever you attack with this ${ModID}:Weapon, add a random card into your hand.

${ModID}:WeaponMastery.NAME: Weapon Mastery
${ModID}:WeaponMastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a ${ModID}:Weapon, draw !M! card.
${ModID}:WeaponMastery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you equip a ${ModID}:Weapon, draw !M! cards.
